register.title: Create OneID Account
register.subtitle: Join our unified identity authentication platform
register.passwordRequirements: Password requirements: At least 8 characters, including lowercase and digits
register.success: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Please enter your verification code
twoFactor.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts, please try again later

profile.title: Profile
profile.twoFactorAuthDesc: Enhance account security with authenticator app
profile.confirmUnlink: Are you sure you want to unlink this account?

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication Setup
mfa.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account
mfa.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code using Google Authenticator or Authy:
mfa.recoveryCodesInfo: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once.
mfa.addExtraSecurity: Add an extra layer of security to your account
mfa.twoFactorDescription: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security by requiring a verification code from your authenticator app when you sign in.
mfa.scanQrCodeDesc: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
mfa.verificationCodeDesc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
mfa.recoveryCodesDesc: Save these recovery codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once.
mfa.saveInSafePlace: Save these codes in a safe place. Each code can only be used once.
mfa.enterPasswordToDisable: Enter your password to disable MFA:
mfa.enterPasswordToRegenerate: Enter your password to regenerate recovery codes:

apiKeys.title: API Key Management
apiKeys.subtitle: Create and manage API keys for programmatic access
apiKeys.noKeys: You haven't created any API keys yet
apiKeys.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key?
apiKeys.copyKey: Please copy the key now, it will only be shown once:

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link
forgotPassword.success: If that email exists, you will receive a password reset email.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Please enter your new password
resetPassword.tokenInvalid: Reset link is invalid or expired

confirmEmail.title: Confirm Email
confirmEmail.successMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in.
confirmEmail.failedMessage: Email confirmation failed. The link may be expired or invalid.
confirmEmail.invalidLink: Invalid confirmation link. Please check your email and try again.

resendConfirmation.title: Resend Confirmation Email
resendConfirmation.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a new verification link
resendConfirmation.success: If that email exists and is not confirmed, you will receive a verification email.

consent.title: Authorization Request
consent.permissionsRequest: This application is requesting the following permissions:
consent.authorizationNote: By clicking "Allow", you authorize {{clientName}} to access your information

errors.networkError: Network error, please check your connection
errors.serverError: Server error, please try again later
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found

secureAuth.title: Secure Authentication
secureAuth.description: Enterprise-grade security with OIDC protocol and MFA support

fastReliable.title: Fast & Reliable
fastReliable.description: Quick authentication with excellent performance and uptime

singleSignOn.title: Single Sign-On
singleSignOn.description: One account for all your applications and services
